name: template-wordpress
description: Template for a custom WordPress theme
author: Corentin Diard

scripts.bundle: dir-archiver --src . --dest ../bundle.zip --exclude .DS_Store .stylelintrc.json .eslintrc .git .gitattributes .github .gitignore README.md composer.json composer.lock node_modules vendor package-lock.json package.json .travis.yml phpcs.xml.dist yarn.lock
